title: Bir zamanlar Osmanli: Kiyam
overview: In 1711, The Ottoman Empire defeated the Russian Empire, but the Ottoman empire then entered a period of decline. Military activities were replaced by entertainments at night. This situation upset folk people and Janissaries. Patrona Halil's brother was executed by the order of the Grand Vizier at that time. Patrona Halil became very angry. He wanted to avenge his brother.
